reviewText: This is my second time purchasing this because the first one I received had no flash so I thought maybe it was just the luck of the draw. However, I just receive the second one and no flash at all. Not to say this wand isn't nice because it is.. labradorite is none for its magical flash and to receive two with not even one speck of flash is largely disappointing.

Good quality Labradorite wands... I have bought several, and all are cut with care. The drilled holes are of ample size for a 49 strand beadwire, or smaller. Probably would not fit most silk or leather chords. No chips or degradation near the holes, either. Medium flash, mostly blue from a dark greenish labradorite stone. I have ordered 5, and none were gray stones. All dark green with blue flash; some slight varied yellow.
summary: Good flash, Decent Grade, Hole Not Too Small

I am a very active person.  I love to run, lift weights, do yoga, stretch, do gymnastics, and basically do anything that will keep me active!  With so much to do, a good fitness wardrobe is essential.  It is nice to not only have several work out outfits when I work out so frequently, but also to have a variety of colors and styles to choose from!

These leggings are super cute and unique.  They are a little bit brighter in color than in the photo that Aiyihan has provided, but they look very nice.  The material is of great quality, not too thick (too hot) or too thin (see through  yuck!).  They are super comfortable, too!  These leggings are a bit long on me, but that is to be expected as I am a 52 little shorty, and it isn't long enough to be a bother, just a little bunched at the ankles.  It would have been nice if there was an actual small or extra small size.  The material thickness is consistent throughout the garment without a distinct waist band, so these leggings are probably not the best to wear for high impact or movement intensive activities.  They are definitely perfect for yoga, though!

I purchased these leggings at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  These leggings are quite cute, and I am quite happy with them.  They are made of a good quality material that holds up well and is super comfortable.  I think that they would be a great and stylish addition to any yogis wardrobe!

reviewText:
I love the style of this suit because it effectively covers the area that I'm less than self confident about but maintains a bit of athletic styling and 'cool' vibe. But, I'm a mom now, so perhaps I'm totally wrong about what's cool...

A lot of reviews say that it runs small so order up. I heeded this advice and found the M on my 5'3" 125 lb frame entirely too big. The loose fabric that covers the torso was incredibly blousy. I am all for loose fitting around my stomach, but had I tried to swim in it, I likely would have gotten an arm caught in it and drowned. It is also uneven on the suit I received- one side gaps much lower than the other- not an issue for me since you get what you pay for, but might annoy some.

Overall, I gave it three stars since it has some style, is usable, but is cheaply produced and sold.

I'll be returning my M for a smaller size and hope that fixes it!
summary: Let's be honest, you get what you pay for, right?

reviewText:
I bought these as casual summer shoes for my girls and they definitely deliver on that aspect. Overall I am happy with them but there are a few little things that could be better.

The mesh is very breathable and although I do not think they are actually water shoes, they can easily be worn to a splash pad or something, as they dry pretty quickly. My baby wore them to a water park and they worked great. I did take off a star for texture...it is SUPER rough and scratchy. The girls did not seem to be bothered by it too much but they are not the most comfortable thing to put on them.

The color is as advertised...we got the purple ones and the girls were thrilled. Very pretty shades of purple...they compliment each other well.

The arch support is pretty flimsy, also why only 4 stars.

The neoprene rim around the top is great...keeps the shoes on very well. I sized up too much for my littlest and despite being too big, they stayed on her feet all 5 hours we were at a water park in and out of the pool, slides, etc. and only slipped off a couple of times. My other daughter whose fit perfectly had no issues.

LOVE the double loop. Makes them SUPER easy to get off and on...use the loop on top to help slide the foot in and then pull up the back with the back loop. Excellent feature. I especially appreciated after I tried to get a different pair of water shoes on the almost 2-year old.

They fit slightly on the smaller side but not awful. You might need to size up.

Cute style. They look really cute...not so narrow as other mesh shoes I have seen.

Nice, thick sole. Keeps their feet very well protected from rocks, rough pool bottoms, hot asphalt, etc. Also has good tread. We had no problems with slipping on the wet pool area.

Overall, they do exactly what I need them to do so I am pleased with the purchase. I have some that are nearly identical and they keep my feet pretty cool, are easy to slip on, and fairly comfortable to wear. My feet have no arches so I need more support than shoes like these offer but kids run around in flip flops without problems where I feel like my feet are going to fall off from hurting so much so the girls have had no issues with wearing them for several hours at a time. If you are looking for orthopedic support, these are not it. But they work great for easy summer shoes. Disclaimer: I was fortunate enough to receive these at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion and unbiased review. I rely very heavily on the reviews of others because I do nearly all my shopping online so I strive to leave helpful feedback on both items I buy at full price and those which I have received for free or at a discount. I hope this has helped you in your purchasing decision. Thank you for reading!
summary: Slightly small, rough mesh, thick sole, dry quickly, fair arch support, easy off and on, great summer shoe

This M&Z Women's Plus Size 2 Piece Swimsuit is very pretty and is pretty accurate on size! I got the Navy color option in size 22-24; I love the dark navy color with the flower pattern and it fits great without being too tight or loose! This swimsuit does have removable and adjustable straps; the top has a tie portion in the back that allows you to remove the straps and not worry about it falling down. This swimsuit comes with the top and the boy short bottoms. I love that the top is flowy in the front instead of hugging my body since I am plus sized and prefer my swimsuits to not bring attention to my stomach. The boy short bottoms are comfortable and fit well without showing too much. I do like that you can wear other bottoms with the top or a different top with the bottoms depending on how you want to do it; I'm not 100% comfortable with showing off my thighs so when I'm out in public instead of just with family and friends then I can wear my skirt bottoms with this top! I would definitely recommend this M&Z Women's Plus Size 2 Piece Swimsuit!

**I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased opinion**
summary: M&Z Women's Plus Size 2 Piece Swimsuit Is Comfortable, Fits Great, And Is Very Pretty!

reviewText: I like this Leeberry quick dry shirt.  It is very lightweight and soft making it very comfortable to wear.  The color may not be for everyone, but I personally like the very bright greenish-yellow hue this t-shirt has.  I recently wore it while power washing the outside of my house.  The t-shirt definitely dried quicker than other t-shirts.  It was cooler temperature wise to wear, also.  The only thing keeping me from giving it another star is that the neck opening is a little too big for my taste.  It kind of reminds me of a women's style shirt.  It will serve my purposes of working out in the sun though.  I received this t-shirt at a discount to give my honest opinion of it.

i got this shirt to work out in it..i needed something light as i cant stand anything on me when i get sweaty...this shirt was perfect...very light , breathable ...drys quickly..i am 200lb 5'8 and this fits like a charm ...the color are bright as advertised...really impressed with this shirt.
disclaimer: i received this product for a reduced price to review it...
A nice high visibility,  lightweight the shirt.  Really breathable material is well made and soft enough to be comfortable.  Nice work shirt.

The description picture shows a pale lime-green shirt; but the shirt that I received is high-visibility yellow.
This color would be suitable if I were landing planes, or directing traffic... at night.  However, it is not what I thought that I was ordering.  I do not know if the other available colors would also be true to the description, or not.

The shirt does appear to be made well; and has neatly stitched seams, and no loose threads.  The material is a comfortable weave, but not the slick polyester/spandex that is common in performance shirts.  The material is very light-weight and breathable, and has proven to be very comfortable and cool while worn outside in the summer heat.

The shirt wears well, but is a little tighter than most large-sized shirts that I own.  It does not restrict movement or feel "too-tight", but is snug.  I had imagined, based on the seller's description picture, that it would hang loosely.

I would have returned this shirt for a refund, based on the BRIGHT color that I'll have little use for; but I did receive this shirt at a discount from Leeberry, in exchange for my honest review, and for that price, I'll just save everyone the hassle.

Like you, I base my purchase decisions on the experiences of others.  If you liked my review, or felt that it was helpful to you, then please let me know by clicking yes below.  I would also be happy to answer any questions that you may have about this product.  Thanks!

My reviews are real, and typically based on weeks of actual product usage.  My opinions are not copied from other reviews, and are from my own personal experiences.  I did receive a discount on this product with the expectation that I provide an honest review; but this has no bearing on my opinions, and I review all products as if I had paid full price.

reviewText: Amazing, light and beautiful
Beautiful watch....very comfortable to wear.  A bargain at this price.
Great looking watch at a great price! I get compliments each time I wear it.

This is quite possibly the coolest and nicest looking watch that I have ever gotten my husband. As soon as he saw this, it was instantly his favorite. He works in a home improvement store, so having a wooden watch is a really cool thing to have, and the design and size of this one is simply stunning. He says he gets more questions and compliments on this watch than he ever has on anything else. What we like: * My husband says his favorite part about this watch is the size. He likes bigger watches and this one is the perfect size according to him. Big bold face that looks great on his fairly large wrist. * The overall coloring. The Zebrawood looks absolutely stunning, and it is a real eye catcher. It still looks like wood, but the zebra look to it just takes it to another level. * The time is easily read, and the Roman Numerals look great. It adds another layer of class to it, and the dials look great as well. Substantial and easily seen, even in the dark since the dials glow in the dark. * Easy to set with the crown on the side, and it isn't so big that it hurts the wrist when you bend your hand all the way back. * The band with the flexible wood links looks great. So professional and adds even more class to it. Also comes with lots of links, so its easily adjustable for almost anyone to wear. * The foldover clasp makes it very easy to put on and take off with one hand. * My husband has been wearing this every single day for over a week now, and it still doesn't have any scratches on the face. * Comes in a lovely box sitting on a black leather pillow, so it would make an excellent gift! What we don't like: 1) This watch DOES NOT tolerate water other than in very small amounts, like washing your hands and then drying underneath it. The wood will swell up and the links won't move anymore, and it may even affect the watch itself if it absorbs too much. Overall, My husband thinks this is a fantastic watch and he is thrilled with it. It was given to him as a gift from me and he didn't like that I kept it for a day so I could take the pictures and video for this. Its always his first choice watch and we couldn't be happier with it! **I purchased this watch at a promotional discount for the purposes of testing and reviewing, but my cost has absolutely no bearing on how I rate a product. I will NEVER give a positive review to an item that doesn't fully deserve it.**
summary: Has become my husbands favorite watch! He loves it!

reviewText: I ordered this as a gift, and can only speak for the appearance. It is a handsome watch, and amazingly light! It arrived nicely boxed with a lovely little "pillow" support.

This time piece comes with plenty of links in the wrist band, so it should fit pretty much anyone. In a short period of time, you can simply remove the links yourself to have the watch fit as needed. It can fit my very small femine wrist (a little lose when sized completely down) and it fits a little loose (what hes customed to) on my husband's very large wrist with no links removed. It has a metal band clasp, where the compressing strenth is about mid-range so not hard to undo but you don't have to worry about the black time set button or the clasp getting caught on something or bumped and coming undone. The numbers are set up in black roman numberals and don't stand out a whole lot to be flashy but all numbers on the face, can be easily read with average sight at proper arms length. The bright glow in the dark hour and minute hands are very easy to be seen in the day or at night. It is a big watch but not chunky or thick to get in the way of movement or clothes. Light weight and yet, not a delicate watch because of the wood they chose to make it from. This is not a dressy watch but it definately works for work, whether its a uniform, jeans or dockers. It may work with a suit depending on the suit. It will work for a night out clubbing, day on the golf course, enjoying a sporting event or dinner and movie with your special someone. It is not easy to find a watch that works well but is also unique looking...this one is both! Not only is it unique to well known brand watches, it's one of a kind since every grain of wood is one of a kind! I can't believe how they use texture and color to make such a statment in this piece...it's truly a piece of art! Packaging and presentation in the gift box makes it even more special, IF we wanted to give it away. While its designed for a man, it would still make a beautiful fashion statement when worn by a woman! I really don't see this watch as being age or sex specific. It really would make an amazing gift for anyone and has proven to be a great conversation starter. Oh, also, I have checked, normally watches like these can easily exceed $200 with other companies so give as a gift and they will think you have spent much more on their gift. I have attached pictures of how it came in the beautiful box and what it looks like on my wrist with no links taken off, since it is now my husband's watch. I received this watch for free for my unbiased honest opinion according to my own and my husband's experience with this beautifully unique time piece.
summary: Gorgeous time piece for a man or woman!

reviewText: I like the idea of wooden watches because it's a great alternative to metal. This one looks great and is eco-friendly and made of natural sandalwood. It's comfortable to wear and is non-toxic and hypo-allergenic. I love that it is hand crafted and goes with many different outfits. It makes a great gift and can be worn by men and women. The band is plenty long enough and some links can be taken off if it's too big. It has a stainless steel clasp and is made of sapphire crystal so it's scratch resistant. It's not waterproof so keep it out of pools and the shower but if it gets very lightly splashed it should be ok. It uses roman numerals instead of numbers which is different. The hands even glow so you see the time at night without having to turn on a light. Overall I like this watch and would recommend it to others. I received this in exchange for an honest and unbiased review and all opinions are my own.

- Not a lot of support for large chests

*CAUTION*  - I dropped from 5 Stars, to 1 Star.
If you'd like, take a look at the rave review I posted when I first got these (see below).

Why the drastic reduction in rating?  Well, BOTH of these glasses broke (quite easily) in less than one week.  The screws holding on the "temple tips" are obviously subpar and/or not designed well at all.  We're talking normal, easy use here.  When the first pair went, I thought, "Hey, bummer, these things happen.  At least I have another pair."  - Then the second one broke within two days.  Same thing.

If they put 10 cents more per pair into these things and strengthened the screw which holds the temple tips, these would be amazing.

At this point, I'm calling Amazon and seeing if I can get a refund.

style.Color:: Gray Polarized with Flash Silver Mirror

reviewText:
I got these because the original lenses on my beloved Oakley Half Jacket 2.0 XL were scratched to the point I was just annoyed wearing them.  Oakley branded replacement lenses were cost prohibitive (may as well buy a whole new pair).  These were inexpensive enough to be low risk in the event they were garbage, but not so inexpensive to guarantee they were garbage.

Well, I love them!  Very happy with this investment.  They look almost identical, block approximately the same amount of light, and are similarly polarized as the originals.  The fit isn't 100%, but it is very close.  A common complaint with other replacement brands were they are noticeably thinner and more flimsy than the original lenses, but from my naked eye observation, these are the same thickness.  Once in, I was blown away by their clarity.  In fairness, that is also a function of how scratched up my old lenses were, but still something to note.

I will absolutely be buying another set or two.  That's not something I would have ever considered, but the affordable price point allows it with these.  Also, they are made in the USA, which is nice and increasingly rare.
summary: Great replacement for original Black Iridium lenses

Great remote for android tv boxes!

I received this mini remote/keyboard for free to test and evaluate.

I hooked this up to the smart tv and it's working like a charm. The keyboard feels good in my hands and is easy to type on with my thumbs. I like that it is rechargeable as that means I am not chewing through a stack of batteries. It took around an hour and a half to fully charge when it arrived. It had a partial charge in it already when it arrived.

The interface on this is easy to use and it is easy to hook up. I tested it with the android tv box and it does function with that, but it is primarily being used with the smart tv. I haven't used it with my computer, I like my computer keyboard for that.
summary: Works great with a smart tv

reviewText:
I connected this keyboard to my Windows 10 computer and also to an android TV box that I have. It worked flawlessly on both devices. On the Windows computer, it connected automatically, and i could do everything that I can do with my full sized keyboard.  Using it on my Windows computer, really liked that I didn't have to use the mouse. I could use the touch pad instead. I opened a Word document, and the key strokes were very responsive with no errors. Personally, I thought that the touch pad was as fast and responsive as the ones on my laptops.

When i tested it on my android TV box, and it was so very much better than the remote that came with the TV box. The touch pad worked well as a mouse, and data entry was so much easier. I also very much like that pressing FN and 6 lights the keyboard. So it can be used in the dark. This keyboard would also be very beneficial for use with a laptop when using a mouse is not convenient. In my opinion, this keyboard would be useful. for any device that the USB dongle can be plugged in.

This keyboard comes with a USB charging cable and the 2.4 GHz USB dongle can be plugged in. It also comes with a user guide that plainly describes the uses of the FN functions and how to use the keyboard. This keyboard is small enough to be completely portable, but has all the functionality of a full sized keyboard. I would highly recommend this keyboard if you have an android TV box, and would also recommend it for use with PC's and laptops when using a mouse is not convenient.
summary: A versatile lighted keyboard that works very well with PC's, laptops, and android TV boxes

reviewText:
The pattern on this doesn't quite look the same as it does in the picture, but had read somewhere that that might be the case, so I was not surprised. Quality-wise, it was very well made for the most part; it did not appear to be see-through or too thin, and when I put it on for the first time, I was not afraid it would rip or the seams would give out. I loved the way it fit on the bottom, but the top was weird. Weird in a way that I could not consider it wearable. The bust band was too big (and not adjustable at all, just a band), and the padding in the chest area was lumpy and not in a proper position. There was no way to remove the padding either, so you would have to cut the seam in that area to remove the padding, and I'm not sure if it could be re-sewn easily without knowing how to sew well. It was disappointing, because there were parts of it I loved, but the top ruined it.

For reference, I am 5'8", 140lbs, 36A, 29-30" waist, 37-38" hips. I usually wear a size 7 in bottoms, a 6/8 in dresses and a medium on top. I got this swimsuit in a LARGE in the white/black pattern.

reviewText:
I'm a gym rat and probably have more gym clothes than I do actual clothes.  I love wearing printed tanks to the gym.  I was pleased to find this tank, and thought it'd be a great addition.

According to the size chart, I'd fit best in an XXL.  (I usually wear a medium, I hate women's sizing, it's always all over the place).  You can see in the photo how it fits me.  It's a little more boxy than I'd like, not like pictured on the model.  If I went down a size though, I'd be afraid it'd be too small, so this will work.

The material itself is very soft and has a slight stretch to it.  The design on front is printed on and I'll have to see how it holds up to a wash.  I stretched it out a bit with my hand and the design didn't crack, so that's a good start.  I might avoid putting in the dryer, but we'll see.

Overall, a cute tank.

That's nice for me because I can cover my tummy now, but I have the option of a tanking when I get my figure back. The material seems a bit thinner than most suits, but I didn't see it in the sunlight, so I'm not sure about the coverage.
The important thing is the fit. Buying clothes online is tough, so I'll be as specific as possible. I am a tiny woman -about a 26 inch waist (0-1 in pants) and a C cup. I got a medium, which says 2-4 US. I'd guess that's the bottoms, and closer to a 2. The bottoms are a bit loose, but just enough to not squeeze anything (probably a similar fit to boxers on a guy.) The top made a stretching/ripping sound when getting it on and off, but once it was on, it covered my boobs well enough.  It's not secure like a sports bra, but I don't feel like I'd fall out if I cannonball. LOL. A small top wouldn't come close to fitting and a small bottom would probably be tight. Their tank top is nice and flows, but the shoulders are tight enough not to fall.

reviewText: This is such a pretty top. The Wine color is so rich. My purchase of this Elbon Boutique Womens Short Sleeve V-Neck Tunic Top With Handkerchief Hem was made on a whim. The material is lightweight but not really thin. It is not see-thru though pairs well with a cami. There is a small sleeve and a very modest neckline. I am always looking for tops that are long enough for me and that will not cling to my body. I also need lightweight clothing as I do not do well in the heat. I am 5'9" tall and since I wasn't sure of the sizing difference I ordered a 3XL and the length and fit is right. Even if the shirt shrinks up any in the dryer it will still fit well. This shirt is very comfortable and looks great with a pair of jeans or you can accessorize and you're ready for a night out. With 20 colors to choose from there is a color to go with almost anything. I have received this product for free or at a discount in exchange for my true and unbiased review. I am not connected to this seller and receive no compensation for my reviews. I care about other peoples reviews when I am shopping, so I do these reviews with a buyer in mind. Elbon Boutique Womens Short Sleeve V-Neck Tunic Top With Handkerchief Hem , Green , X-Large

The straps are also very long so I would not recommend for anyone under 5'3" because you will pop out of this tank in the front and sides. It might work okay as a beach cover up.  I did give it 2 stars as the print quality and design are wonderful.  I definitely would not wear this outside the house given the other flaws.

reviewText:
The 68% Bamboo 27% Cotton 5% Spandex fabric blend used in this Sleeveless V Neck Tank Top is very comfortable to wear. It is a breathable, stretchy, finely knit, jersey type material.

The hem, and seams are all finished nicely with serger zigzag stitching, and it has a printed size/care tag (rather than a fabric tag).
The V neck and arm openings are also finished nicely. The V neck opening is not too deep or too revealing.

The product description says that this top has a Fitted Silhouette and that is a very accurate description of how this top fits; it hugs every curve!
Im a bit more modest in my dress than I was in my younger years, so I wear this tank top layered under other tops.

Overall, I am very happy with the comfort and quality of this VERY form fitting V-Neck Tank Top.

I received a promotional discount on the purchase price of this item to evaluate it and give my honest unbiased opinion and review for other Amazon shoppers.
summary: A cute and comfortable VERY form fitting V-Neck Tank Top

reviewText:
This T-shirt is very nice and sexy looking. I've used many sports tops, this one felt really comfortable to go for a walk or jog and I can later wear it for the groceries too. Very comfortable. I loved the color. It really looks the same as in the picture figure hugging. The material is very soft it's a mix of bamboo and cotton but feels like cottony to skin. It stayed a little cool in it which was very nice since it's really warm right now. I liked the V neckline, it looks very smart and it's not too deep.
The most impressive part was the arm holes they are so perfect as if custom stitched. I was however a little surprised on the color, it said grey but I was expecting a brownish grey like in the picture. But it's a pure grey grey!!! The length is perfect it comes a few inches below the waist line and I wear petites. I am comfortable with that length and doesn't ride up when sitting. The size is way too small, I think the sizes are Asian/ petites. But even for that it seems small. I wear a small/ Medium and still the Large fits really really snug. It does say fitted so perfect description. The stitching and edging are really awesome.
I would love to see a few more colors in them since they are really good. I don't know how they will be in winter, it says they stay warm in winter and cool in summer. They are really cool right now. I thing they will live up to the expectations since they are bamboo and cotton both of which do good in both climates. Overall I'm very pleased with this Shirt. reviewText:
So the black dress (not sure about the other colors just the black one) has NO liner it's more of a cover up than a "dress."  The material is very thin and sheer, it wasn't totally see through but I feel like if you were to wear it anywhere other than someplace with dim indoor lighting you'll be able to see through it.  The slit is about 3 inches max (and I'm being generous, it's probably closer to 2 inches) below your crotch.  So if you do purchase this I would highly recommend a black slip so you aren't accidentally flashing everyone your lady bits.

Also the chest did not lay nicely.  The cut is obviously revealing, but as a 34DD it just didn't lay right and was pulling at the chest so that you could see pretty much my whole boob if you were looking at me from any angle other than straight on.  I got a size medium based on the measurements from the seller so maybe if I sized up it would be better - but because it's so sheer and there's no liner I don't feel like I'll like it even if it did fit better.  So the chest was an issue but so was the loops for the belt, which is totally for show and not at actual belt.  The loops stuck out so far that it ruined the sight lines of the dress.
summary: NO liner and watch out if you're busty

reviewText: This belt is awesome

I've been wearing this belt every day for two months. Please note that this is during July and August in the Mid-Atlantic region of the U.S.

The photos I included show photos of the leather up close for you to decide on the quality based on what you know. I examined the treated underside and how it naps over time, the belt loop, the belt holes, and the texture of the outer lining. See the cons section as to why the photos were taken this way.

As a young guy, this belt starts my foray into leather belts after wearing synthetic leather department store belts my whole life. To day the least, this is hands down the most comfortable belt I have worn in my whole life so far. I've worn it with jeans and business casual attire and it looks great. Not to mention that the color of this belt matches most cognac, walnut, or tan leather shoes and watch straps. I almost thought about returning it for reasons mentioned further down the review, but ultimately, I couldn't do it. The following reasons offer a brief summary of what makes the belt good.

Pros:
- The belt is really supple and It broke in very well after the 2nd day of use. Since then it's been very easy to bend and loop around my pants.
- It feels very nice to the touch, it's not oiled like a dressy watch strap, so it has a slight suede to it even though it's not suede.
- The buckle is round and comfortable, and it doesn't poke and stab my gut like all my previous belts have (both round and square buckles)
- The color started as a cognac color and has darkened a shade or two since wearing the belt (indicator of real leather).

Cons:
My biggest criticism of the watch is about how there's no definitive way to tell what grade of leather this is. The description says full grain leather, but I figured that a company would be proud of that and rightly plant it on the belt itself like most other companies do. I have the $7 full grain leather belt from costco that even has the "full grain leather" stamp on it. A summary of other minor cons are below.

- There is a loose stitch at the end of one of the buckle leather pieces
- The buckle has no indent to hold the pin, thus it moves the belt slightly. It's hard to notice though
- The buckle comes with some sanding and indenting already to give it a "vintage" feeling. I can see where people might find this off-putting
- The underside has some sort of treatment to prevent napping, I would've preferred the natural nap as shown in the belt loop.
summary: Good for replacing department store belts

reviewText: Nice leather belt and buckle at a good price.
summary: Nice leather belt and buckle at a good price.

reviewText:
I love the simple, rugged look. The belt seems sturdy, but still flexible and soft. It has held up for the month or so I've had it so far, and I expect this to last a long time.

I wear pants with a 31 waist, and I got the 34 (32-33") size belt since that was as small as they have. It's maybe slightly longer than I need, but it's a good fit. I use one of the holes near the middle, so there's room to go up or down in size, not that I plan to.

Do note that the buckle is not the one shown in the picture. I didn't end up caring and think the one it came with is probably a better choice anyway. It's the same buckle shown here: https://www.amazon.com/Mens-Grain-Leather-Nickle-Buckle/dp/B01DL3LZQ0/ref=sr_1_1?s=apparel&ie=UTF8&qid=1477501763&sr=1-1&nodeID=7141123011&keywords=hunter%2Ballen%2Bleather%2Bbelt&th=1

This is a pretty simple belt, but I prefer to think of it as "classic."  It is full grain "REAL" leather on the front-side, and has a very attractive color and texture.  It appears to be very high quality.  The back side of the belt is lined with a synthetic material that makes the belt more flexible and it sits extremely nicely at the waist of my husband's pants.  I ordered the smallest size and it is accurately true to the size chart.  He usually wears anywhere between a 30-32 waist for his pants, and I think the belt I ordered was 34.  It fits him just right with the appropriate amount of belt overhang.  I'm sure there's a word for that.  LOL.  The buckle is nice heavy metal, and my kids think it's a "Cowboy belt," even though it obviously doesn't have that style of buckle.  This is a great belt.  My very discerning (aka picky) hubby is thrilled with it, and I can recommend it whole-heartedly.  You won't be disappointed.
I received this product at a free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest review.
AH
summary: My hubby loves this belt!  Very high quality!  Highly recommend!

My favorite color is blue!  I was very excited to try this necklace.  On screen it looked very enticing and fun and would go with many of my outfits.  I was excited to finally receive this today and put it with my favorite blue shirtto find that the necklace more turquoise than blue.  The shirt that I thought it was going to go perfect with is a dark Phatalo Blue and my husband agrees that the leather straps are more turquoise than blue.
The stones are very cute, but Im not sold that they are genuine stone.  Three have 90 degree bends leading me to believe that some of this is shell that has been dyed.  Other pieces I could not find evidence of striations that are typical to all types of stone (rocks, fossils, crystals etc.) that I am familiar with.  The gold colored chain that they are placed onto is very light and has barely any weight to it.  I unfastened it from my neck a couple of times to try out the sizing and the extender did somehow become detached from the necklace via a very tiny gap in the ring.  This necklace was produced in China.
This is still an interesting piece to have in my collection, though I feel that this necklace is rather cheaply constructed.

reviewText: Allegra K Women Diagonal Stripes Drop Sleeves Tunic Top Item size: XS Height: 4'11"; bust: 30"; waist: 24"; hips: 29" Arrived perfectly, no loose seams, very nice. Did fine in the wash (machine-washed and dried), and didn't seem to shrink much, if at all. I really like the length, the heather grey stripes, the drop sleeves and the fact that the sleeve stripes are horizontal while the rest is diagonal. <3 Also, it's almost completely opaque. <3 However, sadly to say, I feel this piece overall won't fit as nicely on a petite person (not on this one, anyway). I don't care for the way it fits in the lower-back. As I mentioned earlier, I do love the length, but being as it's more fitted it just doesn't look as well as it could. Also, the neckline was very wide on me, and I didn't care for that either; not on this particular shirt. I didn't notice the neckline seam being itchy, though, so that was nice. (The pictures are low-quality, but I do hope they may help in someway. <3) The sleeves taper, and from my elbow to my wrist they were very slim (or very snug, I might say). However, they did stretch a bit to a more comfortable fit after wearing it a little longer. If the front and back of this shirt were loose-fitting I would be totally okay with the cons, here. It could've easily been a favorite! <3 I received this item in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

Great bag, better than I expected it will be. I wish they had other colors. This bag looks like the one I saw from Longchamp. Someone here mentioned, that its a suitable bag for farmers market, I could not agree more. It has a really wide bottom, I never saw that wide bottom in a purse, otherwise its small from any other direction, so the bag does not appear big but its really roomy. It has only one interior pocket, that is very small and does not have a zipper, I wish there were more interior pockets, because in the current one you can pretty much just put one thing, either cash or phone, it won't fit more.

Bag is water-resistant. Straps are long enough to wear on my shoulder, but more in the summer, I do not think I will be able to wear it through more clothes. I would prefer that handles were longer. Besides that, the bag is foldable, it is really easy and pretty quick to do. Bag is light weight and the shade of blue is very pretty, nicely matching with brown closure and handles.

Cons:
- Only one, small, interior pocket.

Sample sent for a fair evaluation.
summary: Looks like a designer tote I saw from Longchamp.

reviewText:
For the times when you need to stow a spare bag somewhere, this is pretty good. I have foldable shopping bags (without closures) for the grocery store, and foldable backpacks for informal occasions, but there are times when you might want to have an extra tote that looks a little more presentable---e.g. for carrying vacation purchases and souvenirs, or to hold your work clothes when you have to do a quick change and go from the office straight to dinner.

This is basically a copy of the famous Le Pliage bag from Longchamps that has been around for years and years.  The style endures because it's an ideal mix of traits: simple, versatile, streamlined, lightweight, wipe-clean, practical, and durable.  How can you not love a bag like this?  It's a transitional bag that is equally at home at the gym, work, dinner, or on travel---and the leather accents make it seem a tiny bit luxe.

Everybody needs one of these---it's the type of bag that never goes out of style or loses its usefulness.

---Promotional sample provided for the purpose of candid and objective review.---
summary: Similar to the famous Longchamps "Le Pliage" bag

reviewText:
Amazing bag. Something I noticed is it proved to be versatile due to it being a combination of both a tote and a handbag. I'm amazed at the extravagant simple design that this holds as it doesn't become a flashy merchandise product. The thing that's really cool about this bag is that it comes nicely packaged and it's folded as a miniature bag; it also have a feature that allows you to expand it. The fabric seems to be nylon, something that's unique to me because it's also waterproof. The width of this bag, which is 17" is a big plus to this bag. I can carry a lot of things in this backpack such as my 15.6 Toshiba laptop, and a few books and notebooks. I can get carried away about how this bag is a bag that has the intended purpose of a backpack but in a summary, you'll be happy that you can hold many things in this bag and get around with it really easily.

I received this product in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. I am in no way obligated to give this reviewer a good rating for his/her product and I'm entitled to reviewing this product with as much feedback experience I can give.
summary: Pretty much a versatile bag/tote and offers a wide room for all the necessary stuff you need to put in this bag.

reviewText: This tote is simply adorable and now that NYC is going to be charging for plastic bags coming this September, it will really come in handy. Because this tote folds so small, one can actually stick in their pocket book or if you have a jacket with large pockets, it can fit in there. The handles are leather and the fold down closure that has a snap is leather too. This is great for buying an armful of items to carry home and I will get good use out of it. It is a classic style, 17 X 11 inches, and made of good strong nylon. Mine has no smell at all if anyone is concerned about odor. It is also waterproof in case you get caught in the rain. The bag has an inner pocket and is zippered.  I received this trendy bag free. I've reviewed it of my own free will to the best of my ability with the same objectivity I apply to items purchased at full price. I really like this bag and am going to use it!
summary: Cute and folds up small too!

I wash it in the washing machine on the gentle cycle and hang it to dry and it has held up great. It's very flattering and comfortable. The size was true to size. I am very satisfied with the swimsuit. I usually wear an 18-20, but ordered a 5XL because of the chart! It fits nicely. I think I will enjoy wearing it on our pontoon boat, and to sit on the beach. Thank you.

I'd say this is a flattering suit for almost any shape/size.  The cups are a pain in the rear - the padding inside folds up constantly and it makes the top very "boxy" looking. I have to constantly fix/re-adjust them.  All in all, the suit is pretty TTS and very comfortable.  I'm not generally a fan of the tie-back tops, they tend to pull on my neck. However, it is pretty comfortable and the straps are relatively substantial so they don't dig into your neck the way some do when you are larger on top.

I don't have high hopes, however, that this suit will hold up much past one season.  Even when pulling it on you can hear the seams kind of "pop" and stretch - not indicative of a well-made suit.  But for the price, I guess I'm getting what I paid for.

I DO love the bottom (under the skirt). It has great coverage unlike many suit bottoms, IMO.  They are little 'boy short' style bottoms and they don't ride up, fold, etc.  They are very comfortable and that's pretty much why I gave this suit 4 stars vs. 3 stars.  The bottoms portion of the suit is great!

I am on the short side (5'4") and the skirt comes down pretty long (just above my knee, really). Much longer than expected.  But it's good coverage so I can't complain!

I ALWAYS wear a cover-up with a swimsuit (I'm so self-conscious) but I received some compliments on the top b/c I"m not afraid to show the top of my suit/chest area (whereas a lot of suits don't give me full coverage/make me feel comfortable).

reviewText: Son hermosas

We bought these for our daughter's 4th birthday in October 2017. We loved the bright and colorful, adorable design. They seemed very well made and sturdy, however, after 5 months the boot has a big gash that started along the seam. We had thought that these boots would last at least one fall/winter season for our girl,  especially since she wasn't hard on them - just normal playing and jumping in muddy puddles. Sadly, she still loves them and wants to wear them, but gets absolutely soaked when even walking normally with them since the rip is so low on the boot. We won't be spending another $35 for a pair of boots that lasts less than half a year.
summary: Cute design, not durable - didn't even last 6 months!

This is a mini backpack, not a full size one.  It is bigger than Jansport Half Pint and slightly smaller than Roxy Always Core.  Jansport has cover over the zipper but there's no lining and no padding.  The straps are webbing that can dig into shoulders when the load is too heavy.  It also has a key stay that both Mini Kane and Always Core don't have.  Mini Kane and Always Core are lined and have padded regular width shoulder strap.

Mini Kane is made of fabric used for most school backpacks; tough and long lasting.  The padding is on the backside, bottom, and part of the sides.  It is meant to protect the tablet.  However, the main compartment has no tablet sleeve or a zip pouch.  The outside pocket is slightly gusseted but not meant for any bulky item (won't zip up).  The side pockets have velcro tabs but the sewing is sub-part (mine is already unraveling).  If you have a big Android phone, the pocket may be too small for it.  Sunglasses without case is fine though.  The satiny webbing is also sewn on the strap that you can affix a biner or two.  Because the webbing is satiny, it is hard to have it stay at the length you desire.  To fix it, just use a 1" safety pin to not having to adjust shoulder straps.

If you are looking for a fashion backpack that doesn't look like a school pack and is comfortable to carry, this is a good choice.  The dino camo is brilliant!  It is the reason I bought it (because I already have Roxy Always Core and Jansport Half Pint).  I just got a pterodactyl pin before I found this backpack.  It was fate.  I had to get this backpack.

reviewText: Well this is the second suit Ive ordered from cloudstyle. I was very impressed with the first which was a medium. However this second one I ordered is a large (as ordered) and I really see no difference in jacket size. Furthermore the large pants are smaller than the medium. Not to mention there are lose strings everywhere (as expected but still a pain) and the pants are even missing the metal clasp that holds them shut. Luckily they were kind enough to put a button on them as well. For $70 Im not surprised there are quality lemons but after this one I may not be so inclined to buy another. Id honestly give my first suit 5/5 stars but this one will take some additional work to be ready for interviews/events. Really if the pants were bigger (the mediums in my light grey suit still fit great) I would probably go 4/5 stars here but theres absolutely no consistency in sizing here. All in all, $70 is worth it. Another $30 for mild tailoring and you have yourself a great suit.
summary: Why are my medium pants larger than my large set I ordered?

reviewText: Very comfortable and fit amazing.
Sizing chart seemed to be off. These were too small. We returned them without ordering another size.

I purchased these for my boyfriend who is 6'1", 165 lbs, and waist size 32. I ordered a size small for him based on the sizing chart and other reviewers recommendations. When they arrived he was initially unhappy with the color, as they appear far more yellow than khaki. However, he tried them on and said they were comfortable so he would be fine wearing them.

The shorts are very long, and they reached halfway past his knees, but for some reason the crotch area was very tight, almost as if they were made for a woman's physique... Everything was on full display, and the seam in the middle of the shorts was dividing 'things' VERY obviously. (Google 'moose knuckle' if you're unsure what I'm trying to allude to.) It was a bit ridiculous how much was on display!

I would have chalked it up to the sizing being off, and ordered him a larger size in another color, but I had ordered my dad a pair of the same shorts in an extra large and he had the exact same problem. The shorts fit correctly everywhere except for the crotch area. The length, waist, and butt area fit fine, but you'd have to be a woman to wear these and not turn a few heads! Yikes!

Unfortunately I ended up returning both pairs, which was disappointing because they were a great price.
As an addicted Amazon buyer, I rely on real people's opinions to make educated decisions about what items are worth it to spend my hard-earned money on. Because of this, I aim to leave good, informative reviews for others! If you found my review helpful, please do me a favor and mark it 'Helpful' below! :)
summary: WAAAAY too fitted on the crotch area!

reviewText:
Great fabric, nice combined cotton/linen texture with a touch of spandex stretch, front pockets are lined in light nylon... all very comfortable, breathable in the heat and dry quickly. Back pocket is kinda small, agreed.

The fit is somewhat off, but if you prefer longer shorts or are willing to hem them, it's totally worth it to go up a size and get a deal on comfy shorts which strike a nice balance between classy and casual thanks to the look of the fabric and understated sewn in cuff combined with elastic waistband and drawstring. I normally wear 32x30 pants and found the small to be the best fit. Crotch fits fine, however, the leg lands just at the top of my kneecap, or more where shorts with 11" inseam would land on me. I don't prefer this and will have them hemmed to around 8 or 9" inseam, but I'm happy with the value and they're certainly wearable as is.
summary: Great value - go up a size and hem the leg

Probably would not fit most silk or leather chords. No chips or degradation near the holes, either. Medium flash, mostly blue from a dark greenish labradorite stone. I have ordered 5, and none were gray stones. All dark green with blue flash; some slight varied yellow.

I am a very active person.  I love to run, lift weights, do yoga, stretch, do gymnastics, and basically do anything that will keep me active!  With so much to do, a good fitness wardrobe is essential.  It is nice to not only have several work out outfits when I work out so frequently, but also to have a variety of colors and styles to choose from!

These leggings are super cute and unique.  They are a little bit brighter in color than in the photo that Aiyihan has provided, but they look very nice.  The material is of great quality, not too thick (too hot) or too thin (see through  yuck!).  They are super comfortable, too!  These leggings are a bit long on me, but that is to be expected as I am a 52 little shorty, and it isn't long enough to be a bother, just a little bunched at the ankles.  It would have been nice if there was an actual small or extra small size.  The material thickness is consistent throughout the garment without a distinct waist band, so these leggings are probably not the best to wear for high impact or movement intensive activities.  They are definitely perfect for yoga, though!

I purchased these leggings at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  These leggings are quite cute, and I am quite happy with them.  They are made of a good quality material that holds up well and is super comfortable.  I think that they would be a great and stylish addition to any yogis wardrobe!

reviewText:
I love the style of this suit because it effectively covers the area that I'm less than self confident about but maintains a bit of athletic styling and 'cool' vibe. But, I'm a mom now, so perhaps I'm totally wrong about what's cool...

A lot of reviews say that it runs small so order up. I heeded this advice and found the M on my 5'3" 125 lb frame entirely too big. The loose fabric that covers the torso was incredibly blousy. I am all for loose fitting around my stomach, but had I tried to swim in it, I likely would have gotten an arm caught in it and drowned. It is also uneven on the suit I received- one side gaps much lower than the other- not an issue for me since you get what you pay for, but might annoy some.

Overall, I gave it three stars since it has some style, is usable, but is cheaply produced and sold.

I'll be returning my M for a smaller size and hope that fixes it!
summary: Let's be honest, you get what you pay for, right?

reviewText:
I bought these as casual summer shoes for my girls and they definitely deliver on that aspect. Overall I am happy with them but there are a few little things that could be better.

The mesh is very breathable and although I do not think they are actually water shoes, they can easily be worn to a splash pad or something, as they dry pretty quickly. My baby wore them to a water park and they worked great. I did take off a star for texture...it is SUPER rough and scratchy. The girls did not seem to be bothered by it too much but they are not the most comfortable thing to put on them.

The color is as advertised...we got the purple ones and the girls were thrilled. Very pretty shades of purple...they compliment each other well.

The arch support is pretty flimsy, also why only 4 stars.

The neoprene rim around the top is great...keeps the shoes on very well. I sized up too much for my littlest and despite being too big, they stayed on her feet all 5 hours we were at a water park in and out of the pool, slides, etc. and only slipped off a couple of times. My other daughter whose fit perfectly had no issues.

LOVE the double loop. Makes them SUPER easy to get off and on...use the loop on top to help slide the foot in and then pull up the back with the back loop. Excellent feature. I especially appreciated after I tried to get a different pair of water shoes on the almost 2-year old.

They fit slightly on the smaller side but not awful. You might need to size up.

Cute style. They look really cute...not so narrow as other mesh shoes I have seen.

Nice, thick sole. Keeps their feet very well protected from rocks, rough pool bottoms, hot asphalt, etc. Also has good tread. We had no problems with slipping on the wet pool area.

Overall, they do exactly what I need them to do so I am pleased with the purchase. I have some that are nearly identical and they keep my feet pretty cool, are easy to slip on, and fairly comfortable to wear. My feet have no arches so I need more support than shoes like these offer but kids run around in flip flops without problems where I feel like my feet are going to fall off from hurting so much so the girls have had no issues with wearing them for several hours at a time. If you are looking for orthopedic support, these are not it. But they work great for easy summer shoes. Disclaimer: I was fortunate enough to receive these at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion and unbiased review. I rely very heavily on the reviews of others because I do nearly all my shopping online so I strive to leave helpful feedback on both items I buy at full price and those which I have received for free or at a discount. I hope this has helped you in your purchasing decision. Thank you for reading!
summary: Slightly small, rough mesh, thick sole, dry quickly, fair arch support, easy off and on, great summer shoe

This M&Z Women's Plus Size 2 Piece Swimsuit is very pretty and is pretty accurate on size! I got the Navy color option in size 22-24; I love the dark navy color with the flower pattern and it fits great without being too tight or loose! This swimsuit does have removable and adjustable straps; the top has a tie portion in the back that allows you to remove the straps and not worry about it falling down. This swimsuit comes with the top and the boy short bottoms. I love that the top is flowy in the front instead of hugging my body since I am plus sized and prefer my swimsuits to not bring attention to my stomach. The boy short bottoms are comfortable and fit well without showing too much. I do like that you can wear other bottoms with the top or a different top with the bottoms depending on how you want to do it; I'm not 100% comfortable with showing off my thighs so when I'm out in public instead of just with family and friends then I can wear my skirt bottoms with this top! I would definitely recommend this M&Z Women's Plus Size 2 Piece Swimsuit!

**I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased opinion**
summary: M&Z Women's Plus Size 2 Piece Swimsuit Is Comfortable, Fits Great, And Is Very Pretty!

reviewText: I like this Leeberry quick dry shirt.  It is very lightweight and soft making it very comfortable to wear.  The color may not be for everyone, but I personally like the very bright greenish-yellow hue this t-shirt has.  I recently wore it while power washing the outside of my house.  The t-shirt definitely dried quicker than other t-shirts.  It was cooler temperature wise to wear, also.  The only thing keeping me from giving it another star is that the neck opening is a little too big for my taste.  It kind of reminds me of a women's style shirt.  It will serve my purposes of working out in the sun though.  I received this t-shirt at a discount to give my honest opinion of it.

i got this shirt to work out in it..i needed something light as i cant stand anything on me when i get sweaty...this shirt was perfect...very light , breathable ...drys quickly..i am 200lb 5'8 and this fits like a charm ...the color are bright as advertised...really impressed with this shirt.
disclaimer: i received this product for a reduced price to review it...
A nice high visibility,  lightweight the shirt.  Really breathable material is well made and soft enough to be comfortable.  Nice work shirt.

The description picture shows a pale lime-green shirt; but the shirt that I received is high-visibility yellow.
This color would be suitable if I were landing planes, or directing traffic... at night.  However, it is not what I thought that I was ordering.  I do not know if the other available colors would also be true to the description, or not.

The shirt does appear to be made well; and has neatly stitched seams, and no loose threads.  The material is a comfortable weave, but not the slick polyester/spandex that is common in performance shirts.  The material is very light-weight and breathable, and has proven to be very comfortable and cool while worn outside in the summer heat.

The shirt wears well, but is a little tighter than most large-sized shirts that I own.  It does not restrict movement or feel "too-tight", but is snug.  I had imagined, based on the seller's description picture, that it would hang loosely.

I would have returned this shirt for a refund, based on the BRIGHT color that I'll have little use for; but I did receive this shirt at a discount from Leeberry, in exchange for my honest review, and for that price, I'll just save everyone the hassle.

Like you, I base my purchase decisions on the experiences of others.  If you liked my review, or felt that it was helpful to you, then please let me know by clicking yes below.  I would also be happy to answer any questions that you may have about this product.  Thanks!

My reviews are real, and typically based on weeks of actual product usage.  My opinions are not copied from other reviews, and are from my own personal experiences.  I did receive a discount on this product with the expectation that I provide an honest review; but this has no bearing on my opinions, and I review all products as if I had paid full price.

reviewText: Amazing, light and beautiful
Beautiful watch....very comfortable to wear.  A bargain at this price.
Great looking watch at a great price! I get compliments each time I wear it.

This is quite possibly the coolest and nicest looking watch that I have ever gotten my husband. As soon as he saw this, it was instantly his favorite. He works in a home improvement store, so having a wooden watch is a really cool thing to have, and the design and size of this one is simply stunning. He says he gets more questions and compliments on this watch than he ever has on anything else. What we like: * My husband says his favorite part about this watch is the size. He likes bigger watches and this one is the perfect size according to him. Big bold face that looks great on his fairly large wrist. * The overall coloring. The Zebrawood looks absolutely stunning, and it is a real eye catcher. It still looks like wood, but the zebra look to it just takes it to another level. * The time is easily read, and the Roman Numerals look great. It adds another layer of class to it, and the dials look great as well. Substantial and easily seen, even in the dark since the dials glow in the dark. * Easy to set with the crown on the side, and it isn't so big that it hurts the wrist when you bend your hand all the way back. * The band with the flexible wood links looks great. So professional and adds even more class to it. Also comes with lots of links, so its easily adjustable for almost anyone to wear. * The foldover clasp makes it very easy to put on and take off with one hand. * My husband has been wearing this every single day for over a week now, and it still doesn't have any scratches on the face. * Comes in a lovely box sitting on a black leather pillow, so it would make an excellent gift! What we don't like: 1) This watch DOES NOT tolerate water other than in very small amounts, like washing your hands and then drying underneath it. The wood will swell up and the links won't move anymore, and it may even affect the watch itself if it absorbs too much. Overall, My husband thinks this is a fantastic watch and he is thrilled with it. It was given to him as a gift from me and he didn't like that I kept it for a day so I could take the pictures and video for this. Its always his first choice watch and we couldn't be happier with it! **I purchased this watch at a promotional discount for the purposes of testing and reviewing, but my cost has absolutely no bearing on how I rate a product. I will NEVER give a positive review to an item that doesn't fully deserve it.**
summary: Has become my husbands favorite watch! He loves it!

reviewText: I ordered this as a gift, and can only speak for the appearance. It is a handsome watch, and amazingly light! It arrived nicely boxed with a lovely little "pillow" support.

This time piece comes with plenty of links in the wrist band, so it should fit pretty much anyone. In a short period of time, you can simply remove the links yourself to have the watch fit as needed. It can fit my very small femine wrist (a little lose when sized completely down) and it fits a little loose (what hes customed to) on my husband's very large wrist with no links removed. It has a metal band clasp, where the compressing strenth is about mid-range so not hard to undo but you don't have to worry about the black time set button or the clasp getting caught on something or bumped and coming undone. The numbers are set up in black roman numberals and don't stand out a whole lot to be flashy but all numbers on the face, can be easily read with average sight at proper arms length. The bright glow in the dark hour and minute hands are very easy to be seen in the day or at night. It is a big watch but not chunky or thick to get in the way of movement or clothes. Light weight and yet, not a delicate watch because of the wood they chose to make it from. This is not a dressy watch but it definately works for work, whether its a uniform, jeans or dockers. It may work with a suit depending on the suit. It will work for a night out clubbing, day on the golf course, enjoying a sporting event or dinner and movie with your special someone. It is not easy to find a watch that works well but is also unique looking...this one is both! Not only is it unique to well known brand watches, it's one of a kind since every grain of wood is one of a kind! I can't believe how they use texture and color to make such a statment in this piece...it's truly a piece of art! Packaging and presentation in the gift box makes it even more special, IF we wanted to give it away. While its designed for a man, it would still make a beautiful fashion statement when worn by a woman! I really don't see this watch as being age or sex specific. It really would make an amazing gift for anyone and has proven to be a great conversation starter. Oh, also, I have checked, normally watches like these can easily exceed $200 with other companies so give as a gift and they will think you have spent much more on their gift. I have attached pictures of how it came in the beautiful box and what it looks like on my wrist with no links taken off, since it is now my husband's watch. I received this watch for free for my unbiased honest opinion according to my own and my husband's experience with this beautifully unique time piece.
summary: Gorgeous time piece for a man or woman!

reviewText: I like the idea of wooden watches because it's a great alternative to metal. This one looks great and is eco-friendly and made of natural sandalwood. It's comfortable to wear and is non-toxic and hypo-allergenic. I love that it is hand crafted and goes with many different outfits. It makes a great gift and can be worn by men and women. The band is plenty long enough and some links can be taken off if it's too big. It has a stainless steel clasp and is made of sapphire crystal so it's scratch resistant. It's not waterproof so keep it out of pools and the shower but if it gets very lightly splashed it should be ok. It uses roman numerals instead of numbers which is different. The hands even glow so you see the time at night without having to turn on a light. Overall I like this watch and would recommend it to others. I received this in exchange for an honest and unbiased review and all opinions are my own.

reviewText: Typically I receive an email from a vendor in the hopes that I will write a favorable review after receiving their product.  This is the first time that I specifically sought out to write a review on my own because I so wanted to recommend their product and service.  I really love the dress and found it to be much nicer than I expected.  Good quality, pretty material, color as expected and they did an excellent job of sizing.  They had stressed that their sizes were much smaller than U.S. sizes.  I ordered a US size 10, so when I received the package and saw it was an "XLarge" I was worried.  However, once I tried it on, it was perfect!  They really know how to convert Asian-to-U.S. sizing.  Lastly, it arrived weeks before the original due date and I was able to follow its progress here and there, amazingly so given the two postal services.  Great dress.

Pros:
- High waist hides fat
- Soft and comfortable

Cons:
- Skirt floats up in the water if there's turbulence
- Not a lot of support for large chests

Why the drastic reduction in rating?  Well, BOTH of these glasses broke (quite easily) in less than one week. When the first pair went, I thought, "Hey, bummer, these things happen.  At least I have another pair."  - Then the second one broke within two days.  Same thing.

I got these because the original lenses on my beloved Oakley Half Jacket 2.0 XL were scratched to the point I was just annoyed wearing them.  Oakley branded replacement lenses were cost prohibitive (may as well buy a whole new pair).  These were inexpensive enough to be low risk in the event they were garbage, but not so inexpensive to guarantee they were garbage.

Well, I love them!  Very happy with this investment.  They look almost identical, block approximately the same amount of light, and are similarly polarized as the originals.  The fit isn't 100%, but it is very close.  A common complaint with other replacement brands were they are noticeably thinner and more flimsy than the original lenses, but from my naked eye observation, these are the same thickness.  Once in, I was blown away by their clarity.  In fairness, that is also a function of how scratched up my old lenses were, but still something to note.

I will absolutely be buying another set or two.  That's not something I would have ever considered, but the affordable price point allows it with these.  Also, they are made in the USA, which is nice and increasingly rare.
summary: Great replacement for original Black Iridium lenses

Great remote for android tv boxes!

I received this mini remote/keyboard for free to test and evaluate.

I hooked this up to the smart tv and it's working like a charm. The keyboard feels good in my hands and is easy to type on with my thumbs. I like that it is rechargeable as that means I am not chewing through a stack of batteries. It took around an hour and a half to fully charge when it arrived. It had a partial charge in it already when it arrived.

The interface on this is easy to use and it is easy to hook up. I tested it with the android tv box and it does function with that, but it is primarily being used with the smart tv. I haven't used it with my computer, I like my computer keyboard for that.
summary: Works great with a smart tv

reviewText:
I connected this keyboard to my Windows 10 computer and also to an android TV box that I have. It worked flawlessly on both devices. On the Windows computer, it connected automatically, and i could do everything that I can do with my full sized keyboard.  Using it on my Windows computer, really liked that I didn't have to use the mouse. I could use the touch pad instead. I opened a Word document, and the key strokes were very responsive with no errors. Personally, I thought that the touch pad was as fast and responsive as the ones on my laptops.

When i tested it on my android TV box, and it was so very much better than the remote that came with the TV box. The touch pad worked well as a mouse, and data entry was so much easier. I also very much like that pressing FN and 6 lights the keyboard. So it can be used in the dark. This keyboard would also be very beneficial for use with a laptop when using a mouse is not convenient. In my opinion, this keyboard would be useful. for any device that the USB dongle can be plugged in.

This keyboard comes with a USB charging cable and the 2.4 GHz USB dongle can be plugged in. It also comes with a user guide that plainly describes the uses of the FN functions and how to use the keyboard. This keyboard is small enough to be completely portable, but has all the functionality of a full sized keyboard. I would highly recommend this keyboard if you have an android TV box, and would also recommend it for use with PC's and laptops when using a mouse is not convenient.
summary: A versatile lighted keyboard that works very well with PC's, laptops, and android TV boxes

reviewText:
The pattern on this doesn't quite look the same as it does in the picture, but had read somewhere that that might be the case, so I was not surprised. Quality-wise, it was very well made for the most part; it did not appear to be see-through or too thin, and when I put it on for the first time, I was not afraid it would rip or the seams would give out. I loved the way it fit on the bottom, but the top was weird. Weird in a way that I could not consider it wearable. The bust band was too big (and not adjustable at all, just a band), and the padding in the chest area was lumpy and not in a proper position. There was no way to remove the padding either, so you would have to cut the seam in that area to remove the padding, and I'm not sure if it could be re-sewn easily without knowing how to sew well. It was disappointing, because there were parts of it I loved, but the top ruined it.

For reference, I am 5'8", 140lbs, 36A, 29-30" waist, 37-38" hips. I usually wear a size 7 in bottoms, a 6/8 in dresses and a medium on top. I got this swimsuit in a LARGE in the white/black pattern.

reviewText:
I'm a gym rat and probably have more gym clothes than I do actual clothes.  I love wearing printed tanks to the gym.  I was pleased to find this tank, and thought it'd be a great addition.

According to the size chart, I'd fit best in an XXL.  (I usually wear a medium, I hate women's sizing, it's always all over the place).  You can see in the photo how it fits me.  It's a little more boxy than I'd like, not like pictured on the model.  If I went down a size though, I'd be afraid it'd be too small, so this will work.

The material itself is very soft and has a slight stretch to it.  The design on front is printed on and I'll have to see how it holds up to a wash.  I stretched it out a bit with my hand and the design didn't crack, so that's a good start.  I might avoid putting in the dryer, but we'll see.

Overall, a cute tank.

I am disappointed with this bathing suit for three reasons, the padding is loose and can get wonky or misshapen easily, the material is incredibly thin, and the color is nowhere near as vibrant as what is shown in the product picture which was one of the main reasons I liked it so much. The colors are very pale and almost look bleached out compared to the photo shown. It will work for my needs, I just hope that it holds up since the material is thin. It is cute, I like the cut and the back opening that shows the black straps and tribal print, it is comfortable to wear. I normally wear a medium and I ordered a large based on other reviews stating the top is too small and I'm so glad I did. The top barely works for me and I am a size 34dd, if it didn't come with the tank I probably wouldn't wear it at all for that reason. The tank is a little big, but I expected that, and the shorts fit perfectly, I wear a size 6 in pants and am curvy. I will be hand washing it as I don't trust the padding to come out of a wash cycle right. Overall, I like this bathing suit, and will be using it, but it is a little poorer quality than I would expect. I'm received this at a promotional price in exchange for an honest review.

Firstly, this is a three piece bathing suit. I don't know if that's clear, but the tank top is separate.  That's nice for me because I can cover my tummy now, but I have the option of a tanking when I get my figure back. The material seems a bit thinner than most suits, but I didn't see it in the sunlight, so I'm not sure about the coverage.
The important thing is the fit. Buying clothes online is tough, so I'll be as specific as possible. I am a tiny woman -about a 26 inch waist (0-1 in pants) and a C cup. I got a medium, which says 2-4 US. I'd guess that's the bottoms, and closer to a 2. The bottoms are a bit loose, but just enough to not squeeze anything (probably a similar fit to boxers on a guy.) The top made a stretching/ripping sound when getting it on and off, but once it was on, it covered my boobs well enough.  It's not secure like a sports bra, but I don't feel like I'd fall out if I cannonball. LOL. A small top wouldn't come close to fitting and a small bottom would probably be tight. Their tank top is nice and flows, but the shoulders are tight enough not to fall.

reviewText: This is such a pretty top. The Wine color is so rich. My purchase of this Elbon Boutique Womens Short Sleeve V-Neck Tunic Top With Handkerchief Hem was made on a whim. It looked so cute on the model in the picture. I did not expect it to look good on me or to even be as good as it appeared. I was so wrong. The quality is great. The material is lightweight but not really thin. It is not see-thru though pairs well with a cami. There is a small sleeve and a very modest neckline. I am always looking for tops that are long enough for me and that will not cling to my body. I also need lightweight clothing as I do not do well in the heat. I am 5'9" tall and since I wasn't sure of the sizing difference I ordered a 3XL and the length and fit is right. Even if the shirt shrinks up any in the dryer it will still fit well. This shirt is very comfortable and looks great with a pair of jeans or you can accessorize and you're ready for a night out. With 20 colors to choose from there is a color to go with almost anything. I have received this product for free or at a discount in exchange for my true and unbiased review. I am not connected to this seller and receive no compensation for my reviews. I care about other peoples reviews when I am shopping, so I do these reviews with a buyer in mind. Elbon Boutique Womens Short Sleeve V-Neck Tunic Top With Handkerchief Hem , Green , X-Large
summary: Comfortable for Casual Wear, Stylish for Fun Wear

reviewText:
The 68% Bamboo 27% Cotton 5% Spandex fabric blend used in this Sleeveless V Neck Tank Top is very comfortable to wear. It is a breathable, stretchy, finely knit, jersey type material.

The hem, and seams are all finished nicely with serger zigzag stitching, and it has a printed size/care tag (rather than a fabric tag).
The V neck and arm openings are also finished nicely. The V neck opening is not too deep or too revealing.

The product description says that this top has a Fitted Silhouette and that is a very accurate description of how this top fits; it hugs every curve!
Im a bit more modest in my dress than I was in my younger years, so I wear this tank top layered under other tops.

reviewText:
This T-shirt is very nice and sexy looking. I've used many sports tops, this one felt really comfortable to go for a walk or jog and I can later wear it for the groceries too. Very comfortable. I loved the color. It really looks the same as in the picture figure hugging. The material is very soft it's a mix of bamboo and cotton but feels like cottony to skin. It stayed a little cool in it which was very nice since it's really warm right now. I liked the V neckline, it looks very smart and it's not too deep.
The most impressive part was the arm holes they are so perfect as if custom stitched. I was however a little surprised on the color, it said grey but I was expecting a brownish grey like in the picture. But it's a pure grey grey!!! The length is perfect it comes a few inches below the waist line and I wear petites. I am comfortable with that length and doesn't ride up when sitting. The size is way too small, I think the sizes are Asian/ petites. But even for that it seems small. I wear a small/ Medium and still the Large fits really really snug. It does say fitted so perfect description. The stitching and edging are really awesome.
I would love to see a few more colors in them since they are really good. I don't know how they will be in winter, it says they stay warm in winter and cool in summer. They are really cool right now. I thing they will live up to the expectations since they are bamboo and cotton both of which do good in both climates. Overall I'm very pleased with this Shirt. Would buy more if they are available in more colors since I already have way too many black t-shirts.
I loved the fact that it has full shoulder coverage which makes it even more versatile and perfect for exercising. It covers more than 3" on the shoulder.
I received this product at a discounted rate to try and give my honest and unbiased review. I am not in any obligation to write just a positive review but just my honest opinion about the product.
summary: Small size, good quality, nice and cotton feel!
